name: Dynamic Dino Island
description:
Welcome to Dynamic Dino Island!

The dinosaurs didn't get a fair shake in history, so here you can help them out. Reshape the land so that they can live in a decent ecosystem and thrive. Use elements in nature to reshape the land. Help both dinosaurs to live in harmony!

Controls:

Just the mouse. Left click to make things happen.

Dino Egg: Create random dinosaur

Rainshower: Water the land, create grass

Sunshine: Dry land, kill grass

Meteor Shower: Build land

Big Meteor: Destroy land

Created for Ludum Dare 35. (c) 2016 ActiveUP Games, @dantronlesotho
